| History                 = '''Eat-More''' is a [[United States|U.S.]] based fastfood restaurant chain that strongly opposing [[Homo superior|mutant]] rights. There are Eat-More restaurants located all over the [[United States]].{{r|Cable and X-Force #3}}

The Eat-More Corporation is headed by [[Teresa Payton (Earth-616)|Teresa Payton]]. She seems to have always believed that [[Homo superior|mutants]] were dangerous, but when her daughter was killed by [[Kuan-Yin Xorn (Earth-616)|Magneto]] in [[Manhattan]], she became an outspoken anti-mutant advocate. After she publicly stated that she did not want [[Homo superior|mutants]] coming into her restaurants, Payton and Eat-More received negative publicity because of her "anti-mutant tirade".{{r|Cable and X-Force #3}}

[[Nathan Summers (Earth-616)|Cable]] received a vision of the future where an engineered virus was release through tainted Eat-More meat and mutants were blamed.{{r|Cable and X-Force #3}} To prevent this grim premonition from occurring Cable assembled a new [[X-Force (Earth-616)|X-Force]]. Unfortunately, their attempt to stop the spread of a plagued ended disastrously with the X-Force appearing to be mutant terrorists.{{r|Cable and X-Force #1|#4}}

==Locations==
The main headquarters and processing plant of the Eat-More Corporation are located in Sedona, [[Arizona (State)|Arizona]]. Eat-More has restaurants located all over the [[United States]].
| Equipment               = 
| Transportation          = 
| Weapons                 = * Eat-More has several [[Iron Man Armor|Iron Man]]/[[Mandroid Armor|Mandroid]]-esque armored suits for their guard.
| Notes                   = * The Eat-More Corporation's campaign against [[Homo superior|mutantkind]] rights seem to be a fairly clear reference to the [[Earth-1218|real world]] [http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Chick-fil-A_same-sex_marriage_controversy 2012 Chick-fil-A/same-sex marriage controversy] surrounding Chick-fil-A's opposition of same-sex marriage rights. The Chick-fil-A slogan is "<u>Eat More</u> Chicken".
